channel.title: [advice]Cannible Armour![Advice]
channel.description:
Ok Hey Everyone This is 100%&&!!! totally me!! From scratch im so excited!!!! Ready!!! Ok This is cannible Armour... Have u seen those caribbean Shows.. ui know where theres cannibles trying to eat people like pirates of caribean 3... and such... Well i tried to make some armour like theres or similar... Uhh didt turn out the best ... Im horrible with pants... Ok so u wanna see??? ok So here we go ill show renders then ill show the big In game:: Ok ill get on with it already...
Shield Render: (i got the shield i dea i cant remember but someon did this b4 me but they did better job anyway heres my version)
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Bonehieldrend.png[/img]
Body render:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Bonetops.png[/img]
Pants Render: (i know these r horrible please dont flame at me for that)
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/bonePantss.png[/img]
Ok so here we go the big in game shots:: (these r horrble i know)
Sheild:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Bonesheild.png[/img]
top:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/BoneTop.png[/img]
Bottoms:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/BonePants.png[/img]
Ok i know they didnt work ingame especially pants and top sheild turned out ok... But uh if anyone could helpp make the shield/ pants better ive tried my best and i just can tdo it... so umm post here or pm me if u want to help edit pants/ top... And please dont flame this....
Thanks, Buddy

item.title: [advice]Cannible Armour![Advice]
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

MoparScapeHelp:

Lol ALMOST good… But still need some more work

ya lol im fed up with this lol though… last day of march break and the model i looked forward to working didnt im inda pissed… about it… so if anyone wants to help out i applaud as long as u give me credit for base…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2009, 04:34:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:3, topic:268978”]all bones of runescape imo…[/quote]

its the same bone just over and over… ill show u my failed attempt at making a bone and ull see y i didn’t use my own bone… hold on…

Oh and if u diont have anything constructive to say dont say it!!! its in the rules…
